name: MLModelConfiguration
desc: The settings for creating or updating a machine learning model.

items.name: var parameters: [MLParameterKey : Any]?
items.desc: A dictionary of configuration settings your app can override when loading a model.

items.name: class MLParameterKey
items.desc: The keys for the parameter dictionary in a model configuration or a model update context.

items.name: var preferredMetalDevice: MTLDevice?
items.desc: The metal device you prefer this model use to make predictions (inference) and update the model.

items.name: var allowLowPrecisionAccumulationOnGPU: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether to allow low-precision accumulation on a GPU.

items.name: var computeUnits: MLComputeUnits
items.desc: The processing unit or units the model uses to make predictions.

items.name: enum MLComputeUnits
items.desc: The set of processing-unit configurations the model can use to make predictions.
